alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 24 at 3:57PM EST until December 25 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Life threatening blizzard conditions and lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 3 feet. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. Wind chills as cold as 15 below zero. * WHERE...Jefferson county. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be impossible. Widespread blowing snow could will reduce visibility to zero. Strong winds could cause tree damage. The cold wind chills as low as 15 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Strong winds will cause significant blowing and drifting snow, frequently reducing visibilities to zero. Travel is strongly discouraged.
